answers.answer: They might try and see if they can tell what it is if you'll be 15 weeks :) but you might have to reschedule cuz baby might not be in good position to show his/her goods lol so if I were you drink something sweet like orange juice 45 mins or so before your ultrasound to get baby active :)

i was high risk pregnancy due to incompetent cervix. and they only let me get mine at 20 weeks :( lol i was begged to get one sooner but thats all my insurance would cover. even then they didn't give me a straight answer on what my baby is they said 70% chance a girl. her knees were crossed the whole time lol! but i hope you get to find out what you are having :)
Thank you, I hope we get to find out what it is too...I don't think my fiance can wait any longer lol
I am also a type 1 diabetic and I found out at around 18-19 weeks.
Thank you! So since they said 70% chance a girl, did you end up having a girl?
Howdy diabetic buddy :) and boooo....I don't wanna wait that long lol

i haven't had her yet I'm 27 weeks tomorrow lol. but they did a view of her butt area and said they couldn't see anything at all even if it was a boy something will be there. but I'm going with girl because i just feel she is. in the ultrasounds she has my nose. so cute. and I'm going to try to pay for an ultrasound to confirm before she gets here. either way i will be happy if its a he or she as long as babys healthy in my arms i'll be a proud mama. but i only have a girl name lol

I am high risk to. I found out what i was having at 17 weeks.  And I am 35 weeks and 4 days. At my last uterlsound I had when I was 33 weeks I had them check again to make sure that they where right when they told me at 17 weeks and it is a girl.
Okay, Thanks Y'all For Advice And Input :)
High risk also due to incompetent cervix. I found out at 17 weeks a boy. Im now 25weeks and everything is good so far.im worried bc my cervix is slowly shortening.
Im High Risk this pregnancy! Because i had my first son at 34weeks and 2days, my water broke

I'm a high risk of diabetes I'm be 37 weeks tomorrow n my baby is healthy n good but the only bad thing is I'm in the hospital since Tuesday because of diabetes high blood pressure so they keeping me her into she's born when I turn 38 weeks

My doc is doin my gender check at 20weeks. Im high risk due to diabetes also and everythig has been normal for me and baby. Just take care of yourself and baby and be worry free. The worst thing for you to do is not take care of the diabetes. Other than that you should be fine
I am extremely high risk also because I delivered my previous at 24 weeks and I have a short cervix. I'm 11 weeks & crossing my fingers to find out the gender in the next 2 weeks

question: Howdy Ladies! So I Found Out Last Week At My Doctors Appointment That Because I Am A Type 1 Juvenile Diabetic That I Have A High Risk Pregnancy :( But So Far Baby Seems Healthy With Good Heartbeat...Anyway My Question Is  For Any Mommies Or Mommies To Be That Have Gone Through A High Risk Pregnancy, I Am 15 Weeks Today And I'm Wondering If They Do The Gender Ultrasound Earlier Than Normal..I'm Anxious And So Is My Fiancé, I Have My FollowUp Doctors Appointment Next Wednesday (April 2Nd) And I'll Be 15 Weeks And 5 Days..Is That Too Soon To Find Out Gender Of The Baby? Just Curious...
title: high risk
